scripts.preapp:start: docker stop tasklistv2; docker container rm tasklistv2; rm app/tmp/pids/server.pid || true
scripts.app:install: docker exec -it tasklistv2 /tasklist/bin/bundle install && npm install
scripts.db:build: echo "No database build script exists for this application."
scripts.predb:start: docker stop tasklist-db; docker container rm tasklist-db || true
scripts.db:start: docker run -p 5432:5432/tcp -v tasklistvol:/var/lib/postgresql/data: -e POSTGRES_USER=webuser -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=webuser1 --name tasklist-db -d postgres
scripts.build: npm run db:build && npm run app:build
scripts.serve: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.start: npm run db:start && npm run app:start
